description.value:
Flowering raxilites gain a +2 racial bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.GcVVfpQ79HdcMqBt]{Bluff} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C]{Diplomacy} checks. Seeding raxilites gain a +2 racial bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.3QdtsfnVJsHEdrt0]{Acrobatics} checks and can attempt a DC 15 Acrobatics check to negate falling damage when in an atmosphere. A raxilite can change from flowering to seeding (or vice versa) with 1 week of rest.

Switch between Flowering or Seeding with the modifiers in the Modifiers tab.

modifiers.name: Flowering
modifiers.notes: Flowering raxilites gain a +2 racial bonus to  Bluff and  Diplomacy checks.

modifiers.name: Flowering
modifiers.notes: Flowering raxilites gain a +2 racial bonus to  Bluff and  Diplomacy checks.

modifiers.name: Seeding
modifiers.notes: Seeding raxilites gain a +2 racial bonus to  Acrobatics checks and can attempt a DC 15 Acrobatics check to negate falling damage when in an atmosphere.
